TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(object sender, CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs)
public delegate void CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs ^ e);
type CanExecuteRoutedEventHandler = delegate of obj * CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: Destino de comando que invoca al controlador.

span.span: The command target that is invoking the handler.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El determina si el comando asociado con el origen del evento es capaz de ejecutar en el destino del comando.The determines if the command associated with the event source is able to execute on the command target. Si el comando tiene un origen de comando que especifica un destino, la información de destino puede obtenerse a través de `sender`.If the command has a command source that specifies a target, then the target information can be obtained through `sender`. Si el no está establecido, el elemento con foco de teclado es el destino y también puede obtenerse a través de `sender`.If the is not set, the element with keyboard focus is the target, and can also be obtained through `sender`. Si se determina que el comando puede ejecutarse en el destino, el propiedad debe establecerse en `true`; de lo contrario, establézcalo en `false`.If it is determined that the command can execute on the target, then the property should be set to `true`; otherwise, set it to `false`. No deberá basarse en datos de evento para determinar el comando, origen y destino.You do not need to rely on event data to determine the command, source, and target. Puede limitar el uso del controlador a las invocaciones de comando posible conocido, aunque esto es más difícil de lograr si la estructura de comandos depende en gran parte el enrutamiento de comandos para ejecutar el mismo comando en posibles destinos sucesivos en un evento ruta.You can limit the usage of the handler to known possible command invocations, although this is more difficult to accomplish if your command structure relies extensively on the command routing to execute the same command on successive potential targets in an event route. ## Examples El ejemplo siguiente se muestra un que establece a `true`.The following example shows a that sets to `true`. [!code-csharp[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerCanExecuteHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlercanexecutehandler)] [!code-vb[commandwithhandler#CommandHandlerCanExecuteHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlercanexecutehandler)]
